ingredients: 1  shortcrust pastry crust, 6   +   1/2 ounces 70% dark chocolate, chopped, 1   +   1/2 cups ground almonds, 2  eggs,   +   1/2 cup superfine sugar, 6   +   1/2 tablespoons butter, softened, 3  pears - peeled, cored, and quartered
